metrolook-guest:
Used for descbribing you as a guest editing the wiki.
{{Identical|Guest}}
metrolook-tiles: Used to configure the first set of tiles, which are displayed when $wgMetrolookBartile is set to true. The message's format is: * URL to the site|alternative text|image URL For example: * http://www.pidgi.net/wiki/|PidgiWiki|http://images.pidgi.net/pidgiwikitiletop.png
metrolook-tiles-second: Used to configure the second set of tiles, which are displayed when $wgMetrolookBartile is set to false. The format is same as that of [[MediaWiki:Metrolook-tiles]].
